full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYUD THAMS CAD KYI RGYAL PO DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BSKYED RIM GYI RNAM GZHAG MKHAS PA'I YID 'PHROG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @064B CES DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BSKYED PA'I RIM @065A *, ,PA LA SLOB PA'I TSUL RNAM PAR BSHAD PA 'DI NI MKHAS GRUB SHES RAB SENGGE DANG, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA SBYIN PA DPAL GNYIS KYI THUGS SRAS BRGYUD PA KUN DGA' DON GRUB KYI GSUNG BSGROS RNYING BA LA GZHI BYAS, CHOS KYI SPYAN LDAN RDO RJE'I SLOB DPON CHOS LDAN BLO GROS KYI GSUNG GIS KHA 'GENG DGOS PA RNAMS BSKANG, RJE NYID KYI RNAM GZHAG t'I KKA DANG MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BSKYED RIM RNAM BSHAD KYIS CUNG ZAD RGYAS PAR SPROS, BDAG GIS CHOS 'DI'I BKA' DRIN MNOS PA'I YONGS 'DZIN GNYIS KYI GSUNG GIS ZUR NAS BRGYAN, MKHAS PA GZHAN DAG GIS KYANG LEGS PAR BSHAD PA THOS PAS GSEB NAS 'TSANGS TE, PHYOGS GCIG TU SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RDO RJE 'DZIN PA BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS DBEN GNAS BYAMS PA GLING DU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUG CIG , ,, @065B ,SVA STI, GSANG CHEN 'DUS PA'I RGYUD RGYAL SNYING PO'I GNAD, ,GSAL MDZAD PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PAS GSUNGS, BSKYED RIM ZAB MO PHYOGS MTHAR 'PHEL BA'I PHYIR, ,AA MDO KHAMS TSAN NYID KYI SNGAGS RAM PA, ,BLO BZANG DON GRUB LHAG BSAM RNAM DAG GIS, ,KUN DGA' CHOS KYI GLING GI PAR DU SGRUB, ,DGE 'BRAS MDO SNGAGS @066A *, ,BSTAN PA PHYOGS BCUR 'PHEL, ,'GRO KUN PHAN BDE DPAL LA SPYOD PAR SHOG ,CES PA 'DI NI MKHAN 'DZIN BSAM GRUB BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,DGE BA 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
